name: Beshaped Blitz
description:
Matching objects of the same color can provide pure, simplistic joy. But a lot of people love variations on match-three games — staples of the “match three or more like colors together” formula — because they add a layer of personality. 

Beshaped Blitz  is a matching game that the goal is to literally "match-four game" by selecting all 4 shapes of the same color at the 4 right angles of a bigger square in order to get the highest point possible in one minute; doing so earns you points and clears those shapes off the screen. 

The larger size square you select, the more points you get.

As you clear out the shapes, the new ones will be initiated to replace them.
